page.title: 18Transport
page.content: All of the families in our area have at least one car.Most of them have two cars and the farms have most cars, one as many as four.As well as the car the farmers have other forms of transport as well; pick up trucks, vans and of course tractors make up the total number of forms of transport.Although many families have bikes very few use them, even when going short journies. There is a taxi service in our area and the drivers take between eighty and a hundred customers a week. The bus service runs every hour and connects Paull and Thorngumbald with Withernsea and Hull.Roughly fifty people a day travel on the bus, sometimes going to Hedon sometimes to Hull. There is a mobile library that comes to the area every fortnight.
